'''''Parma Eldalamberon 5''''' is the fifth issue of ''[[Parma Eldalamberon]]'', a journal of linguistic studies of the Elvish languages and names in the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].

It is the last issue of its initial run.
{{PEnav|4|6}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "The Song Unsung: Arwen in the House of Her Father" — Paula Marmor

* Articles
** "''Beth-Luis-Nion''" (column) — Paula Marmor
** "''I Andonnar Nwalme-Lório'': A Report on the Fourth Annual Meeting of the M.L.F." — [[Christopher Gilson]]
** "Early Studies in Old Solar" — Joe R. Christopher
** "Proto-Eldarin Vowels: A Comparative Survey" — Christopher Gilson and [[Bill Welden]]
** "Language, Thought and Fantasy" — David Warren
** "Corrections to the Tengwar and Certar Values Assigned in Current Editions of ''The Lord of the Rings''" — [[Jim Allan]]
** "A Middle English Source for 'Middle-earth'" — David Strecker

* Mathoms
* Runes: Letters to ''Parma''
* Back cover: [[:File:Parma Eldalamberon 5 backcover.png|A poem]] — Sindarin by Christopher Gilson and Bill Welden, Tengwar by Paula Marmor
